thread.title: Notable & Quotable: Big Data, Blunt Instrument

author: wsjcom
title: Notable & Quotable: Big Data, Blunt Instrument
text:
From “Why big data is a blunt instrument” in Management Today (U.K.) by Editor Matthew Gwyther, Oct. 2:
In recent years many claims have been made for data. Few of them have been small. Most things in the excitable and frothy world of data are not just big. They are mega. “Big data” is the thing of the moment. If you don’t get it you...
